instruction: What metric was chosen to measure the explanatory power and predictability of the models, and how far can this metric go in the state-factor models developed to predict the abundance of dominant phyla and bacterial diversities in Australian soils?
Output: The metric chosen to measure the explanatory power and predictability of the models is the coefficient of determination (R-2).
